alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 9:25PM CST until January 03 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Low accumulation of a dusting to one inch expected across the lower elevations. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches possible across higher elevations and ridgetops such as Lookout Mountain and Signal Mountain. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Hamilton County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High winds and heavy snow rates will reduce visibility and make travel difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
